headline: PNC Results Strengthen Amid Uncertain Macro Environment
summary: The Pittsburgh bank and financial-services company reported net income of $1.64 billion, or $3.85 a share, for the second quarter, up from $1.48 billion, or $3.39 a share, in the prior-year period.

headline: PNC Financial Services Group (NYSE:PNC) Exceeds Q2 Expectations
summary: Financial services giant PNC (NYSE:PNC) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 4.6% year on year to $5.66 billion. Its GAAP profit of $3.85 per share was 8.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
